channel.title: How do i change client's ground texture and graphics..?
channel.description: Well, ive been wondering how to do it.. this is kind of client/server since you had to add a few things to source too (i guess) Well, pretty much title says it all.

item.title: How do i change client's ground texture and graphics..?

item.description:
@b15 wrote:

1st off this is the wrong section. your post needs to be in client help. also changing to hd is extremely hard and its just worth getting a pre made server with it.

item.title: How do i change client's ground texture and graphics..?
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

Sorry it is wrong section. there is nothing to add in server side. ill still help you though

Open Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3

search for “if (i == 1) { i =” with out " "

change each 1 ind fiddle around till u find what number is floors.

if u want to make every thing lava replace all with this"

if (i == 1) { i = 40; }

if (i == 2) { i = 40; }

if (i == 3) { i = 40; }

if (i == 4) { i = 40; }

if (i == 5) { i = 40; }
